version_description:
This release fixes the upload issues detected in version 5.6.5


Thanks for using the Dailymotion app. Got feedback? Found a problem? We'd love to hear from you. Drop us a line: iphone-feedback@dailymotion.com

What's new in this release:


Bug fixes and some minor corrections


Thanks for using the Dailymotion app. Got feedback? Found a problem? We'd love to hear from you. Drop us a line: iphone-feedback@dailymotion.com

What's new in this release:


Bug fixes and some minor corrections


Thanks for using the Dailymotion app. Got feedback? Found a problem? We'd love to hear from you. Drop us a line: iphone-feedback@dailymotion.com

What's new in this release:


Bug fixes and some minor corrections


Thanks for using the Dailymotion app. Got feedback? Found a problem? We'd love to hear from you. Drop us a line: iphone-feedback@dailymotion.com

該版本中的新內容


修复了一些漏洞，提高了稳定性


谢谢使用 Dailymotion 应用。如果您有反馈意见或发现了问题，欢迎随时告诉我们。请发送电子邮件至：iphone-feedback@dailymotion.com

What's new in this release

The brand new Dailymotion is here. Totally redesigned and rebuilt, our new immersive viewing experience focuses on your interests by crafting personal video adventures just for you. Open the app to try it out and learn more.

What's new in this release

The brand new Dailymotion is here. Totally redesigned and rebuilt, our new immersive viewing experience focuses on your interests by crafting personal video adventures just for you. Open the app to try it out and learn more.

此版本的新內容

全新 Dailymotion 體驗正式問世。經過全面重新設計與改造，我們嶄新的沈浸式觀賞體驗注重您的喜好，為您精心打造個人專屬的驚奇觀影之旅。歡迎開啟 App 試用並了解更多詳情。請注意，我們現在還無法與 Chromecast 搭配使用，不過我們正在加緊努力，力圖在近期提供該功能。請您耐心等候。

What's new in this release

Great news, this new version of the app now fully supports Chromecast… even for live streams. We’re really, really, really sorry that it wasn’t available on the previous update, it was important that we only release when we were totally satisfied with the feature. Thanks for your patience.

What's new in this release


Performance enhancements and bug fixes; in particular improving the experience around offline video - eliminating the app crashes when trying to cast, delete or save offline videos. Keep sending the feedback, it’s really helpful.

What's new in this release

• Bug fixes
• Improved stability

Immediate access to videos everywhere; our promise to you.
This is a corrective release to fix 2 bugs that were causing havoc when the video contained an unescaped character in the title (...yes, really) and when watching playlists on less recent devices.
We're working everyday to improve the app experience, and your feedback is invaluable - please keep sending.

This release is jam packed with a multitude of nuggets including:
Improved iOS 11 compatibility - multi-tasking is now supported on iPad, and on both iPad and iPhone, password autofill and out-of-the-app drag and drop to share your favorite videos with friends.
You'll also notice that signing in to the app is a much smoother experience as we've re-implemented support for password managers (1password, Dashlane & Lastpass)
Finally, for those who are still reading, we also fixed a very very long list of bugs that were spoiling your experience.
▪Channels or topics can now be accessed from the subscriptions page
▪All videos from a channel are now displayed in the "All the videos" section
▪All videos in a playlist are now visible in the watching queue
▪Resolved the bugs that were making the app crash for some of you on Playlists and after signing in with Facebook

Improved loading time for the Explore screen will make discovering the web’s best video content even easier. Combined with an improved app memory footprint to ensure optimized power usage and memory consumption on your device. And, a release is not a release without a few bug fixes! In addition to a lot of small fixes, and a couple of bigger ones: the app no longer crashes when trying to autoplay the next video, and we've fixed the issue where a white screen was displayed instead of a video in certain countries

In this release we’ve fixed several bugs that were causing black screens on video playback, and have made some improvements to the sign in screen. For iPhone X users,  the Home Screen Indicator is no longer visible when watching in full-screen mode.

This release provides a certain number of bug fixes:
The app now works correctly on iOS 9.0 devices.
We've eliminated the app crash that occurred when using 3D Touch to preview a channel.
Password protected videos are now fully supported.
We fixed some small issues with regards to account settings.

Because spotless homepages are the new chic, we’ve moved the For You section to your Library as  “Latest videos from your Channels & Topics ”. And, because your videos can now be organized according to their publication date, you can easily find the latest unmissable videos from  Channels and Topics you love.
In our latest version we have fixed the issues some of you have encountered when trying to download videos.

Because spotless homepages are the new chic, we’ve moved the For You section to your Library as  “Latest videos from your Channels & Topics ”. And, because your videos can now be organized according to their publication date, you can easily find the latest unmissable videos from  Channels and Topics you love.

We’re on the move!
Big news! We’ve rolled out a brand new home page that combines all the latest news and entertainment into a new intuitive feed worthy of the name. Forget the endless scrolling and old static feed that felt like a traffic jam on a Friday— our new design gives you instant access to Daily Pulse and the most interesting stuff happening in the world right now. And, because we were crafted by, and for, people who care about great videos, we’ve added an extra menu page on the top right hand corner where you can browse all the top newsworthy videos of the day. This includes a selection of dailymotion recommendations, global news and popular channels making noise on the internet.

We’re on the move!
Big news! We’ve rolled out a brand new home page that combines all the latest news and entertainment into a new intuitive feed worthy of the name. Forget the endless scrolling and old static feed that felt like a traffic jam on a Friday— our new design gives you instant access to Daily Pulse and the most interesting stuff happening in the world right now. And, because we were crafted by, and for, people who care about great videos, we’ve added an extra menu page on the top right hand corner where you can browse all the top newsworthy videos of the day. This includes a selection of dailymotion recommendations, global news and popular channels making noise on the internet.

We recently brought to you a brand-new feed full of fresh new video recommendations. As we rolled out the new home, a few of you got a sneak peek of our new autoplaying feature. Now everyone can enjoy their dynamic feed by activating autoplay in the app settings. Because this feature consumes data, you can chose between autoplaying on wifi only, or on wifi and mobile data.

Hot on the heels of the new home feed we recently released on mobile, we're thrilled to announce that this release includes a tablet-specific version.  Tablet users can also now enjoy a seamless scroll-to-play experience on the home feed with autoplay. Don't forget, default autoplay behavior (activate or deactivate) can be customized in the app settings.

This release includes a brand new watching experience for all mobile and tablet users. In this new watching experience the player resizes on scroll so you can easily discover the next video you want to watch from the queue or see what is coming up in your playlist. Tapping on a thumbnail in the related queue will bring up a new selection of related videos. Actions on videos are now located just below the video, making it easier for you to like, follow, save, download or share a video as you watch it.

Looking to easily skip ahead or rewind a few seconds in a video? Use the double-tap to seek gesture in your app (also now directly in your mobile browser) by tapping on the right or the left of your screen to skip to certain sections of a video.
In our latest version we have fixed the issues some of you have encountered when trying to download videos.

Our home screen has had a full makeover to better suit your needs, provide you with a quicker access to our catalog’s finest videos and give you your daily dose of info in one place. Because news travels fast, the new feed only highlights the very latest headlines in news, entertainment, sports and music. From our top picks and recent sports antics, to the newly dropped music that “gets the people going”, you can find everything you need at a glance.

Our home screen has had a full makeover to better suit your needs, provide you with a quicker access to our catalog’s finest videos and give you your daily dose of info in one place. Because news travels fast, the new feed only highlights the very latest headlines in news, entertainment, sports and music. From our top picks and recent sports antics, to the newly dropped music that “gets the people going”, you can find everything you need at a glance.

In this release we’ve re-implemented an improved version of Picture in Picture which we had removed a couple of weeks ago as we felt the experience it offered was unsatisfactory. Thanks for your feedback and for bearing with us whilst we worked on it.

In this version, we have changed the search layout to make it even easier to find the videos you love:
· Easier search navigation with a new organisation
· More relevant search results
· Additional video information.
This is just the beginning—more search updates are coming soon.
Sign in with Apple is now available on this latest version of our app. Create an account or log in to your Dailymotion account quickly and securely using your Apple ID.
We've updated our search. You can now filter video results by duration and upload date, and select the most popular or most recent videos.

With this release, you’ll be able to pause and resume downloads. We’ve also improved the Chromecast experience so that the casted video will no longer be paused when the app is in background mode. You’ll notice other fixes and enhancements as well.
In this release, logged users will have access to a brand-new feed called "Following" giving them instant access to the latest videos published by the channels and topics they follow.
In this release, we have added a recommendation section to your following feed making it easier to discover more channels of interest.
